name: Digging Time (demo)
description: This is the demo of a game I am working on, I will be making the game WAY bigger but first I want to see if there are any current bugs to it. The game is a 2d digging game where you pretty much dig ores, the ores can be sold for money so you buy upgrades in the upgrade tree! Please inform me of all the bugs there might be so I can fix them. Thanks!
